programme.title: It's Been Hard Convincing Allies that it's War
programme.short_synopsis: On first anniversary of the 9/11 attacks, Alistair Cooke muses on a new type of warfare.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on the anniversary of the September 11 attacks and considers a type of warfare so new that some European generals can't be convinced it is war at all.
